channel.title: Shop help [508]
channel.description: Hey guys i have been trying to fix this problem for quite a while on my server i am having problems making items sellable and where you can buy x amount of an item. I am using mezzy-scape 3.5 source if anyone could help that would be awesome. I added a shops.java and shophandler.java and did all it then compiled and i have this error [img]http://i1190.photobucket.com/albums/z451/Horror-Scape/shopserror.png?t=1293568016[/img]
